unnormalised: **Bharotantlem Rajkoseey Gotto Q2-ant Unno Zata, Punn Avhanam Urtat**
normalised: **Bharotantlem Vittiya Totuk Dusrea Timaent Unnem Zalem, Punn Avhanam Urtat**

unnormalised: Nove Dehli - Orth Mantralayan uktavne kel'lea tatkalleachea ankdeanchea pormannem FY24 chea dusrea teen maheeaneanchea kallant (Q2) Bharoti orthvevosthent rajkoseey arogenth thoddi sudarponn disun ailee. Rajkoseey gotto, sorkarachea rinni zayeche zannvai cho mukhel suchok, GDP chea 3.4% meren unno zalo, zo pichlea vorsachea kalavadhent 3.9% itlo aslo. Kendree sorkarachea vaddttea kor utponnak ani zannvayen kel'lea karch vevosthaponnak lagun hem sakaratmak udharonn ghoddlem. Tori punn, orthik zannkar sachet kortat ki fuddlo rosto avhano bhorel'lo asa, ani veg-vegllea orthik ghoddnukam rajkoseey bhavisya khatir dhumki divpak xaktat.
normalised: Nove Dilli - Orth Mantralayan uktavnn kel'lea tatkalin ankddeanchea pormonnem, Bharoti orthvevosthen F-Y chovisachea dusrea timaent (Q Don) aplea vittiya arogient thoddi sudarop zali. Vittiya totuk, sorkarachea udhari ghevpachea gorjecho ek mukhel suchok, Ji-Di-Pi che tin point char tokke meren unnem zalem, je pattlea vorosachea sombondit kallant tin point no tokke aslem. Hem sakaratmak udorgot kendriya sorkarak vaddttea kor utponnak ani zannvayen kortubukechea vevosthapnak lagon asa. Punn, vittiya drishtikonnak sambhavit dhoko ditolea kitleach macro-arthik ghottkonchea sangata vhodd panth asa mhonn dhyan diunk zannkar suchoitat.

unnormalised: Arthik riportachea vistrut vishleshanant disun yeta ki Q2 velear sorkaracho kull karch ₹10.5 lakh koti aslo, zalear kull mell ₹9.8 lakh koti aslem. ₹0.7 lakh koti chem antar hem teen maheeaneanchea kallachem rajkoseey gotto dakoita. Riport fuddem sangta ki GST utponnan vorsam voros 12% vadd disli, ji vaddtte arthik utpadan ani sudharlelea kor vevharan zali. Direkt kor utponnantuy arogyadai vadd 9% dista, ji corporate kor ani vyaktigat utponn korak lagun zalea.
normalised: Arthik ahevalaicho vistarit vishleshan dakhoita ki Q Donachea vellar sorkari kortubukecho kherch rupia dha point panch lakh kotti aslo, zalear utponn rupia no point atth lakh kotti aslem. Rupia shunya point sat lakh kottinchem ontor tem timachea vittiya totuka dakhoita. Ahevalan munnlam ki Ji-Es-Ti sangrohant vorosachea pormannem bara tokkeanchi vhodd vadd zali, ji vaddtte orthik karyavoll ani sudaril'lea korachea palnank dakhoita. Dhaktea kor sangrohan corporate kor ani vyaktigat utponn kor lagun no tokkeanchi sehatmand vadd dakhoili.

unnormalised: Sorkarachi rajkoseey ektrikoronnachi pratijna karch niyantronn korpachea prayatnant disun yeta. FY24 khatir sudharlelem bud'dhechya ankdem GDP chea 5.8% rajkoseey gotto dakoita, ani FY26 meren 4.5% chem ud'dhisht sadhy korpak sorkaracho hetu asa. Hem mahatvakankshi ud'dhisht sadhy korpak utponn ubharani vaddovpak ani karch uttam korpak satatyan prayatnachi goroz asa. Riport ₹51000 koti chea vinnisguntovnuke ud'dhishtacho ul'lekh korta, zo rajkoseey antar bhorpak gorjecho asa.
normalised: Vittiya ektrannik sorkarachem otmyota dakhovnk kortubukancher niyantron dovrunk prayatn kartat. F-Y chovisachi sudaril'li andazpatri andazitri Ji-Di-Pi che panch point atth tokke vittiya totuk prokulp karta ani sorkarachem F-Y povis meren char point panch tokkeachem dhyey sadhya korpak asa. Hem mahatvakankshi dhyey sadhya korpak utponn utpadan vaddovpak ani kortubukacher nirnay ghevpak satatya asa. Ahevalan rupia pon'nas ek hazar kotti vinivesh dhyeyacho-i ul'lekh kela, jem vittiya ontor bhorunk khup mhotvachem asa.

unnormalised: Arthik riportant uktavne kel'le mukhel chintaankodden vaddttea rinnachea patlleecho aspav asa. Q2 chea xevttak GDP chea tokddeache rupant sorkarachem kull rinn 59.8% aslem. Hem niyontronnak yogya axil'lem astanam, orthik zannkar sachet kortat ki unch rinnachi patlli desachi orthvevostha bhaylea dhakkyank chalu korunk xakta. Riport rajkoseey nisttha ani jababdari rinni zayechi goroz dukhoita jeatlean lambkallek teko divunk sadhya zata.
normalised: Arthik ahevalant ul'lekh kel'le mukhel chinteantlean ek vadhtea rinanchi patlli asa. Q Donchea xevottak Ji-Di-Pi che tokke pormonnem sorkarachem ekun rin ekunsahtt point atth tokke aslem. Hem niyantronnak aspak lagta, zannkar suchoitat ki vhodd rinachi patlli orthvevosthek baherlea dhakkeank poddunk zata. Ahevalan vittiya niyam'mitiponnachi ani jababdari udhari ghevpachi goroz vistarli.

unnormalised: Chintechi dusri vost man'ngelear Bharoti orthvevosthecher ghoddchea jagtik arthik anischitanchi asar zata. Amerika ani China modli chalu asli axil'li vepar zhogddi, vaddttea vikasit desantlea vyajachea dara sangatak mellun, Bharotachea niryativar ani bhondvalachea pravahavar nakaratmak asar korunk xakta. Arthik riport hem dhumke kami korpak ani orthvevosthek bhaylea varea pasun sambhallpak yogy upay gheunk sangta.
normalised: Chintechi dusri zaga Bharoti orthvevostecher jagtik orthik asthirtencho probhav asa. Yu-Es ani Chaina modem choltea veaparachea zhuzachea sangata vaddhote vyajanchea darank Bharotachea niyaticher ani ponjibharacher nakaratmak probhav poddtta. Arthik ahevalan hea dhokheank mellovpak ani orthvevosthek baherlea dhokheam pasun vataovpak karyokram ghunkpavpak sanglam.

unnormalised: Riport vagddechea dabhanchea avhanak legit man'nata. Upbhokte Mol Suchk (Consumer Price Index- CPI) vagddai Bharatiya Reserve Bank (RBI) chea 4% chea aramachea vibhagachea voile votten chalu axil'li Q2 kalant. RBI vagddain vagddai niyontronn korpak upay ghetle astanam, jeatlean repo dar 6.5% meren voir kaddlem, riport suchoita ki vagddai tame korpak odhik rajniti upay gorjeche poddunk xaktat.
normalised: Ahevalan vadhhtea mohagai vaprak ugddas kela. Grahak Mol Suchik (Si-Pi-Ai) mohagai Donchea vhodd kallak Bharotachea Reserve Bankachea (Ar-Bi-Ai's) char tokkeachea aramachea zonnari voir urli. Ar-Bi-Ain mohagai niyantronnant dovrunk podam ukalli, tantunt Repo dar so point panch tokke vaddovpant asllem. Ahevalan mohagai niyantronnant dovornnk anik niti madat diunk zata mhonn suchoita.

unnormalised: Sankxepan, Q2 arthik riport Bharoti orthvevosthechem ekttham kel'lem chitronn dakoita. Rajkoseey gotta unno korop hem sakaratmak chin'n astanam, veg-vegllea vostunchi goroz asta. Sorkarak zagrut ravoonk zai ani hem avhanak uttor divpak ani teko divunk arthik vikas sadhy korpak yogy upay ghevnchi poddttelem. Fuddlem budgett FY25 khatir rajkoseey ektrikoronn ani arthik vikas khatir sorkarachem vevstha dakoitel'lem mukhel astolem. Arthsastri utsuktayen polletale ki Rs. 51000 Cr. chem vinnisguntovnuke ud'dhisht arthik vorsache xevttak bhettoi zatelem kai, ani sudharlele ankde kitem astele. Odikachem, Mai 2024 antlea Lok Sabha venchnuken karchacher ani arthik rajniticher kitem asar zateli tem pollovpak asta.
normalised: Nimannea sondarbhant Q Donacho arthik aheval Bharoti orthvevostechem mellshil chitran dakhovta. Vittiya totuk unnem zal'lem ek sakaratmak nishann asa, punn anik avhanam urtat. Sorkaran husar ravpachi ani hea avhanak mellovpak ani satatya divpachea orthik udorgotek karyakram ukallpak goroz asa. F-Y povisachem andazpotr vittiya ektrannik ani orthik udorgotek sorkarachem margdarshan dakhoitolem. Orthshastri husaren rupia pon'nas ek hazar kottinchem vinivesh dhyey vittiya vorosachea xevottak bhorunk ditolem vo sudaril'li andazitri kiteak astoli tem polletat. Aplea bhair Mai don hazar chonvisantle Lok Sabha vennuchen kortubukancher ani orthik niti voirt kit poddttolem tem-i pollovpachem asa.
